docs.title: AI Pipeline Deep Dive
docs.description: The AI Pipeline orchestrates the complete data processing flow in Game Insights. This document provides detailed documentation for each component.

docs.description: Automatically detect unusual patterns in your game metrics

frontMatter.title: Anomaly Detection
frontMatter.description: Automatically detect unusual patterns in your game metrics

docs.title: Game Type Detection
docs.description: Game Insights automatically classifies your game into one of five categories based on the data columns present. This enables game-specific metrics, visualizations, and recommendations.

docs.title: AI & Analytics Overview
docs.description: Game Insights leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning to automatically analyze your game data and provide actionable insights. This guide explains the AI capabilities and how they work together.

docs.title: Schema Analysis
docs.description: The Schema Analyzer automatically detects the semantic meaning of columns in your data. This enables Game Insights to understand what your data represents and provide relevant analysis.

docs.title: Data Adapters API
docs.description: Data adapters provide a unified interface for connecting to various data sources. All adapters extend the BaseAdapter abstract class and implement a consistent API for data retrieval.

docs.title: AI Pipeline API
docs.description: The AI Pipeline orchestrates data analysis through multiple stages: sampling, schema analysis, game detection, cleaning, metrics calculation, anomaly detection, cohort analysis, funnel detection, and insight generation.

docs.title: Data Providers API
docs.description: Data Providers implement a factory pattern to deliver game-type-specific data handlers. Each provider returns retention, funnel, revenue, and KPI data tailored to the game category.

docs.title: API Reference
docs.description: This section provides comprehensive documentation for developers who want to extend, customize, or integrate with Game Insights. All APIs are written in TypeScript and follow consistent patterns for ease of use.
